Free Look

The Free Look module handles looking around while orbiting a pivot point. Free look is the most common camera module to handle basic look functionality.

  • Input: The input axis.

  • Range: The minimum and maximum angle of the look axis. Usually the y-axis is limited to -89¬∞ and 89¬∞ otherwise the camera will become flipped.

  • Initial Angle: The initial angle of the look axis.
